Actions.Name: Slice and Dice
Actions.Effects: May dash 1 before or after attack.

Actions.Name: Smoke Bomb
Actions.Description: Create a blast 1 area of difficult terrain in range 3. Characters in the area gain cover and characters other than Looters are blinded+. This area lasts until this ability is used again.

Actions.Name: Mug
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is slowed. If that foe has a valuables token, they take [fray] damage, then the looter takes a valuables token from them.

Actions.Name: Swing Sack
Actions.Description: An adjacent character takes 2 damage once. Deal 2 damage again for each valuables token the Looter has.
